"Bud" Robertson Jr. (July 18, 1930https://www.encyclopedia.com/children/scholarly-magazines/robertson-james-i-jr-1930-james-irvin-robertson-jr – November 2, 2019) was an American historian. He was a known scholar on the American Civil War. He was an Alumni Distinguished Professor Emeritus at Virginia Tech. Robertson died on November 2, 2019 of cancer in Richmond, Virginia, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Virginia Tech bio * Virginia Center for Civil War Studies * Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Virginia Category:American historians Category:Educators from Virginia Category:Writers from Virginia
